out: This statistic shows the preferred number of TV show episodes to watch in one binge watching session among Millennials in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in December 2016. During the survey, 13 percent of respondents aged 18 to 24 years stated that they preferred to watch five episodes of a TV show in one binge watching session.

This statistic shows the number of enterprises in the restaurants and mobile food service activities industry in the European Union ( EU-28 ) in 2016, by country. In 2016, there were 167,338 enterprises in the restaurants and mobile food service activities industry in France.

The statistics depicts the number of registered ice hockey players in Latvia from 2010/11 to 2018/19. In the 2018/19 season, there were a total of 7,700 registered ice hockey players in Latvia according to the International Ice Hockey Federation.
This statistic shows the percentage of GDP contributed by female workers in selected regions as of 2015. In that year, 41 percent of the GDP of China was contributed by female workers.
This statistic shows the preferred countries of the BRICS countries to visit if money was no object. In Brazil, the preferred countries were 2.7, followed by China, and South Africa.
This statistic shows the share of ITV family TV commercial impacts in the United Kingdom ( UK ) from 2009 to 2017. In 2017, ITV family share of television commercial impacts amounted to 34.5 percent.
This statistic shows the estimated containerized cargo flows on major container trade routes in 2020, by trade route. In 2020, the Trans-Pacific containerized cargo flow amounted to 25 million TEUs.
This statistic shows the distribution of Italian citizens belonging to religious minorities in Italy in 2019. In 2019, 20.9 percent of Italian citizens were Muslims.

This statistic shows the annual turnover of sporting equipment retail stores in Austria from 2008 to 2015. In 2015, sporting equipment retail stores generated a turnover of approximately 1.18 billion euros.

The statistic shows the position of the Puerto Rican women's soccer team in the FIFA world ranking from 2009 to 2020. In 2020, the Puerto Rican women's soccer team ranked 106th in the FIFA world ranking.
This statistic shows the boxed chocolate market share in Canada in 2018, by company. In that year, Ferrero held a market share of 22.9 percent in Canada, followed by Nestlé with 21.2 percent.

This statistic shows the total value of gross mortgage lending in the United Kingdom ( UK ) from 2007 to the first quarter of 2020. In 2019, the total value of gross mortgage lending amounted to approximately 276.17 billion British pounds.

This statistic presents the share of Facebook users in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in January 2018, by household income. During the survey period, it was found that 87 percent of respondents with a household income of up to £14k used the social networking site.

This statistic shows the mal-employment rates of university graduates in the United States in 2000,2007, 2010, by age group. In 2010, 29.6 percent of university graduates aged 55 to 64 were mal-employed.

This statistic shows the housing affordability index by autonomous community in Spain from April 2019 to April 2019. The Balearic Islands had the highest housing affordability index at 15.7, followed by Catalonia at 8.3.

This statistic shows the total amount of freight transported by all inland modes of transport in Turkey from 2006 to 2019. In 2019, approximately 33.7 billion tonne-kilometers of freight were transported by all inland modes of transport in Turkey.

The statistic shows the growth in real GDP in Zambia from 2009 to 2018, with projections up until 2021. In 2018, Zambia's real gross domestic product increased by around 4.04 percent compared to the previous year.
In 2020, the Puerto Rican men's soccer team ranked 178th in the FIFA world ranking, up from 181th place the previous year.
The timeline depicts the gate receipts of the Philadelphia Phillies from 2009 to 2019. In 2019, the gate receipts of the Philadelphia Phillies were at 108 million U.S. dollars.
This statistic shows the global revenue of the Engel & Völkers brand from 2008 to 2019. In 2019, the Engel & Völkers brand generated a global revenue of approximately 820 million euros.

This statistic shows the quarterly retail sales of women's lingerie, sleepwear and underwear in Canada from 2014 to 2019. Sales of women's lingerie, sleepwear and underwear in Canada amounted to approximately 646.77 million Canadian dollars in the fourth quarter of 2019.

This statistic shows the average paid circulation of the San Jose Mercury News from October 2011 to March 2013. In March 2013, the average paid circulation of the San Jose Mercury News was 772,218 copies.
This graph depicts the value of the Columbus Blue Jackets franchise of the National Hockey League from 2006 to 2019. In 2019, the franchise had an estimated value of 325 million U.S. dollars.

This statistic shows the value added by nursing and residential care facilities in the United States from 1998 to 2019. In 2019, the value added by nursing and residential care facilities in the U.S. amounted to approximately 158 billion U.S. dollars.

The statistic shows the distribution of broadcasting revenue of Manchester United from 2010 to 2020. In 2020, 12 percent of Manchester United's broadcasting revenue was generated through media rights UEFA matches.

This statistic shows the growth rate of the express and small parcels market in Asia Pacific from 2012 to 2016, with projections up until 2020. In 2016, the express and small parcels market in Asia Pacific grew by 14.5 percent.
This statistic shows the estimated population of each continent from 10,000 BC to 2000CE. In 2000, the estimated population of North America was approximately 315 million people.
This statistic shows the distribution of households in urban and rural South Africa in 2018, by household size. In 2018, about 29 percent of South African households were living in rural areas.

This statistic shows the prevalence of the pill as a contraceptive method among married or in-union women in Europe in 2015, by country. In 2015, 49.9 percent of married or in-union women in Portugal used the pill as a contraceptive method.
This statistic shows the life expectancy at birth in Latin America & Caribbean from 2008 to 2018. In 2018, the average life expectancy at birth in Latin America & Caribbean was 75.44 years.

This statistic presents the opinions of social media users in the United States on social media discussions regarding politics as of August 2016. During the survey period, it was found that 40 percent of respondents stated that they said things when discussing politics on social media that they would never say in person.

This statistic shows the results of a survey among Americans on the amount they expect to spend during Black Friday and Cyber Monday compared to last year. During the survey period, five percent of respondents stated they expect to spend much more during Black Friday and Cyber Monday compared to last year.

This statistic shows the number of hacking offenses per 100 capita in the Netherlands from 2012 to 2019, by type of hacking. In 2019, there were 8.2 hacking offenses per 100 capita in the Netherlands.

In 2019, the number of automated teller machines ( ATMs ) per hundred thousand adults in Malaysia amounted to 44.71 machines per hundred thousand adults. The number of ATMs in Malaysia has been steadily increasing since 2005.

This statistic shows the number of football jerseys sold by the Paris Saint-Germain club worldwide between 2011 and 2017/2018. In the 2017/2018 season, the Paris Saint-Germain club sold 900.000 football jerseys worldwide.

This statistic shows the results of a survey among adult Americans on the methods used in order to quit smoking. 75 percent of respondents stated that they quit or tried to quit without assistance, while 11 percent used nicotine replacement medication ( like nicotine gum, patch or inhaler ) or other medications.
This statistic shows the number of working computers available for people in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in 2013. In 2013, 24 percent of respondents stated that they had no computer in their household.

The statistic shows the youth unemployment rate in Spain from 1999 and 2020. According to the source, the data are ILO estimates. In 2020, the estimated youth unemployment rate in Spain was at 31.13 percent.
This statistic shows Sanofi's expenditure on research and development from 2008 to 2019. In 2019, Sanofi's expenditure on research and development amounted to approximately 6.06 billion euros.

This statistic shows the number of social network users in Malaysia from 2017 to 2019, with projections up until 2025. In 2019, the number of social network users in Malaysia amounted to approximately 28.98 million.
The statistic shows the average ticket price at NCAA college football games in the United States in 2020, by conference. In 2020, the SEC had an average ticket price of 168 U.S. dollars.

The statistic shows the distribution of the workforce across economic sectors in Canada from 2010 to 2020. In 2020, 1.42 percent of the workforce in Canada were active in the agricultural sector, 19.4 percent in industry and 79.18 percent in the service sector.

This statistic presents the leading in-game purchases made by gamers in the United States as of May 2018, sorted by gender. During the survey period, it was found that 33 percent of female gamers made playable characters in their in-game purchases.

The statistic shows the audience market share of television broadcasting companies in Denmark from December 28, 2020 to January 3, 2021. TV 2 had a market share of 46.9 percent, followed by DR with 35.3 percent.
This statistic shows the coal-mining employment in Wyoming from 2010 to 2019, by mine type. In 2019, about 133 people were employed in the underground mine industry in Wyoming.
This statistic shows the life expectancy at birth in Guatemala from 2008 to 2018. In 2018, the average life expectancy at birth in Guatemala was 74.06 years.

This statistic shows the results of a survey among online shoppers in the United Kingdom ( UK ) regarding their purchase of art and/or collectibles directly through a click-and-buy or click-and-bid in the last 12 months in 2019. In 2019, 44 percent of respondents stated they purchased art and/or collectibles directly online through a click-and-buy or click-and-bid.
This statistic shows the share of individuals who purchased food or groceries online in Greece from 2011 to 2019. In 2019, nine percent of individuals purchased groceries online in Greece.

This statistic shows the workforce in the non-residential food catering sector in the United Kingdom ( UK ) from 2003 to 2019. In 2019, the workforce in the non-residential food catering sector amounted to approximately 1.8 million people.
This statistic shows the employment level of the United States from 1990 to 2019. In 2019, about 157.54 million people were employed in the United States.

This statistic presents the global number of user data requests to Facebook from federal agencies and governments as of the first half of 2020. As of the first half of 2020, Facebook received 177,592 user data requests from federal agencies and governments.

This statistic illustrates the total amount of cement exported from Great Britain ( GB ) annually from 2001 to 2015. In 2015, the total amount of cement exported from Great Britain amounted to 0 thousand metric tons.

Counter-Strike : Global Offensive ( CS : GO ) had 24 million monthly active users worldwide as of February 2020, up from 17.22 million in the previous year. Counter-Strike : Global Offensive is a multiplayer online multiplayer game developed by CS : GO.

This statistic shows the distribution of food waste disposal in the United States in 2012, by industry sector. In 2012, residential food waste accounted for 47 percent of food waste disposal in the United States.
The statistic shows the average annual player salary in Ligue 1 in 2019/2020, by team. In the 2019/2020 season, PSG had an average player salary of 8.93 million U.S. dollars.

This statistic shows the trade value of vegetables imported to the United States from 2015 to 2019, by type. In 2019, the trade value of processed vegetables imported to the United States amounted to about 2.8 billion U.S. dollars.
This statistic shows the age structure in Jamaica from 2009 to 2019. In 2019, about 23.53 percent of Jamaica's total population were aged 0 to 14 years.

According to a survey carried out in Romania on the coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) epidemic, 14 percent of respondents stated that they spent their time alone, while 22 percent spent their time with their life partner. For further information about the coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) pandemic, please visit our dedicated Facts and Figures page.
This statistic shows the number of mobile cellular subscriptions per 100 inhabitants in Qatar between 2000 and 2019. There were 138.33 mobile subscriptions registered for every 100 people in 2019.
The statistic shows the soccer players with the most appearances at the FIFA World Cup from 1930 to 2018. Lothar Matthäus ranked first with 25 appearances at the World Cup.

As of March 2020, 76 percent of Chinese consumers stated that they convinced others to stop using a brand due to its inappropriate response to the coronavirus pandemic. India and South Korea were the second and third most affected countries worldwide. For further information about the coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) pandemic, please visit our dedicated Facts and Figures page.
PlayerUnknown's Battlegrounds ( PUBG ) was released on Steam in November 2020. The game had a total of 438,922 concurrent players on Steam in November 2020.

This statistic shows the national debt of the Gambia from 2014 to 2018, with projections up until 2024. The figures refer to the whole country and include the debts of the state, the communities, the municipalities and the social insurances. In 2018, the national debt of the Gambia amounted to approximately 1.33 billion U.S. dollars.

This statistic shows the environmental and social criteria importance for investment decisions in France as of September 2019. During the survey, 44 percent of respondents stated that environmental and social criteria were important for investment decisions.
As of May 2019, Andrés Manuel López Obrador, president of Mexico, had around 5.54 million Twitter followers. Mauricio Macri, president of Argentina, had around 4.81 million Twitter followers.
This statistic shows the poverty headcount ratio in Indonesia from 2008 to 2018. In 2018, 9.8 percent of Indonesia's population lived below the poverty headcount ratio.

This statistic shows the share of economic sectors in the gross domestic product ( GDP ) in North Macedonia from 2009 to 2019. In 2019, the share of agriculture in North Macedonia's gross domestic product was 8.77 percent, industry contributed approximately 23.95 percent and the services sector contributed about 54.58 percent.
This statistic shows the leading ten retailers of Europe in 2018, based on global retail sales. In that year, the German Schwarz Group had global retail sales amounting to 121.6 billion U.S. dollars.

The statistic shows Spain's budget balance in relation to the gross domestic product ( GDP ) from 2015 to 2019, with projections up until 2025. A positive value indicates a budget surplus, a negative value indicates a deficit. In 2019, Spain's budget deficit amounted to around 2.83 percent of the gross domestic product.

The statistic shows the distribution of employment in New Zealand by economic sector from 2010 to 2020. In 2020, 5.55 percent of the employees in New Zealand were active in the agricultural sector, 19.4 percent in industry and 75.05 percent in the service sector.

This statistic shows the results of the European Parliament elections in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in 2014, by national party. The UKIP had the highest percentage of votes at 26.77 percent, followed by the Labour Party at 24.74 percent.

This statistic shows the net profits and losses of the Italian luxury fashion company Guccio Gucci in 2014 and 2018. In 2018, the net profits of Guccio Gucci amounted to approximately 71.86 million euros.

The statistic shows gross domestic product ( GDP ) per capita in Malaysia from 1985 to 2019, with projections up until 2025. GDP is the total value of all goods and services produced in a country in a year. It is considered to be a very important indicator of the economic strength of a country and a positive change is an indicator of economic growth. In 2019, the GDP per capita in Malaysia amounted to around 11,193.02 U.S. dollars.
This statistic shows Rio Tinto's total revenue from 2001 to 2019. In 2019, Rio Tinto's total revenue amounted to 43.16 billion U.S. dollars.
This statistic shows the employment rate among minors aged 5 to 17 in Mexico in 2015 and 2017. In 2017, 11 percent of minors aged 5 to 17 years were employed in Mexico.

This statistic shows the results of a survey among adult Americans on how long they think the feeling of love can last in a relationship. 77 percent of respondents stated that they think the feeling of love can last a lifetime in a relationship.

This statistic shows the final consumption expenditure of households in Czechia on clothing from 2008 to 2018. In 2018, the household consumption expenditure on clothing in Czechia amounted to approximately 67.9 billion euros.

This statistic displays the retail price of hand rolling tobacco across selected European countries in 2016. The UK had the highest hand rolling tobacco retail price at 19.65 British pounds, followed by Ireland at 18.55 British pounds.

This statistic shows the moral morality of gay or lesbian relationships in the United States from 2001 to 2019. In 2019, 63 percent of respondents stated that gay or lesbian relationships were morally acceptable.
This statistic shows the importance of work-life balance among employees in the U.S. in 2018. During the survey, 72 percent of respondents stated that work-life balance was very important.

This statistic shows the distribution of the gross domestic product ( GDP ) of British Columbia in 2019, by industry. In 2019, the construction industry accounted for 8.91 percent of British Columbia's GDP.
This statistic shows the global ADAS unit shipments in 2020, by OEM. In that year, General Motors Group's ADAS unit shipments amounted to approximately 15.5 million units.

As of March 2020, Robert Lewandowski is the all-time leader in goals scored for the national football team of Poland with 61 goals scored, followed by Wlodzimierz Lubanski with 44 goals, and Grzegorz Lato with 42 goals.
This statistic shows the number of successfully crowdfunded projects on Kickstarter.com from 2010 to 2014. In 2014, there were 22,252 successfully crowdfunded projects on Kickstarter.com.

This statistic shows the number of passenger cars produced by BMW worldwide from 1999 to 2014. In 2014, BMW produced approximately 2.17 million passenger cars worldwide.

At the end of fiscal year 2015, the total number of teachers in universities and colleges in India amounted to approximately 1.2 million. This was a decrease from the previous fiscal year, when there were around 1.1 million teachers in the country.

This statistic shows the number of enterprises in the manufacture of cocoa, chocolate and sugar confectionery industry in Luxembourg from 2008 to 2016. In 2016, there were one enterprises manufacturing cocoa, chocolate and sugar confectionery in Luxembourg.

This statistic shows the most important customer experience/interaction attributes in the United States as of March 2014. During the survey, 82 percent of respondents stated that the accuracy and quality of information provided was the most important attribute.

This statistic shows the total length of the railway lines in use in the European Union ( EU-28 ) from 1990 to 2018. In 2018, the length of the railway lines in use amounted to approximately 218 thousand kilometers.
This statistic presents the leading active social media platforms in Germany in 2019. During the survey period, it was found that 79 percent of respondents used WhatsApp.

This statistic shows the number of employed persons in Switzerland from 2010 to 2018, with projections up until 2020. In 2018, the number of employed persons in Switzerland amounted to approximately 5.06 million.
This statistic shows the value of imports and exports from the European Union to Mercosur from 2008 to 2019. In 2019, the value of imports to Mercosur amounted to approximately 35.9 billion euros.

This statistic shows the attendance rate at children's and other programs offered through U.S. public libraries per 5,000 inhabitants in 2009, by location. In 2009, the attendance rate in urban areas was 1,276 per 5,000 inhabitants.
This statistic shows the export volume of pork worldwide in 2020, by leading country. In that year, the EU was the leading exporter of pork worldwide, with approximately 3.9 million metric tons.

This statistic shows the share of adults visiting the pub weekly in the United Kingdom ( UK ) between 2010 and 2014, by gender. In 2014, 44 percent of men and 24 percent of women visited the pub weekly.

In fiscal year 2019, the import value of organic chemicals to India amounted to over 996.72 billion Indian rupees. This was followed by the import value of resin chemicals and allied products, which amounted to over 527 billion rupees.
This statistic shows the number of primary school pupils receiving lessons in Gaelic in public funded schools in Scotland in 2017. In 2017, 3,168 pupils received lessons in Gaelic medium education.
This statistic shows the total population of Malawi from 2015 to 2016, with projections up until 2025. In 2016, the total population of Malawi amounted to approximately 18.63 million inhabitants.

This statistic shows the annual revenue of the fintech sector in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in 2014, by main subsectors. Payments accounted for 10 billion British pounds of revenue in the UK fintech sector in 2014.
This statistic shows smartphone usage in the United Kingdom from 2012 to 2015. In 2015, 68 percent of male respondents and 72 percent of female respondents reported using a smartphone.

This statistic shows the results of a survey among internet users in the United Kingdom ( UK ) on the number of streaming services they currently subscribe to. During the survey period, 26 percent of respondents stated that they currently subscribed to one streaming service.

This statistic shows the share of women using gyms, fitness clubs, sports or leisure centers in Australia in 2020, by age. In 2020, 31.2 percent of women aged between 15 and 17 years used gyms, fitness clubs, sports or leisure centers in Australia.

This statistic shows the reasons for paying for a music streaming subscription in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in 2013. During the survey period, 60 percent of respondents said they used the full version on a free trial and liked it.

Glasgow City was the most populous council area in Scotland in 2019, with 633.12 thousand inhabitants. The City of Edinburgh was the second most populous council area in Scotland, with 524.93 thousand inhabitants.

The statistic shows the prices of a pie at stadiums from football clubs in the National League in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in 2017/2018. The price of a pie at Gateshead was 2.4 British pounds, followed by Boreham Wood at 2.5 British pounds.

According to a survey conducted in April 2020, 67 percent of Russian respondents believed that the economic situation would not improve in the next 12 months, while only six percent thought that the economic situation would only get worse in the next 12 months.

The statistic shows the price for a soft drink at National Football League games in the 2019 season, by team. The price for a soft drink at a concession stand in the Indianapolis Colts is at six U.S. dollars.

This statistic shows the quarterly revenue for small domestic appliances in the United Kingdom ( UK ) from the third quarter of 2012 to the first quarter of 2020. In the first quarter of 2020, the revenue for small domestic appliances amounted to 560 million British pounds.

This statistic shows the number of resident condominiums and private apartments in Singapore from 2009 to 2018. In 2018, there were approximately 220 thousand resident condominiums and private apartments in Singapore.

This statistic shows the number of netizens in Indonesia from 2010 to 2013. In 2013, there were approximately 31.7 million netizens living in Indonesia.

This statistic presents the share of online users in the United States who reported being addicted to social media as of April 2019, sorted by ethnicity. During the survey period, 30 percent of Hispanic online users stated that they were addicted to social media.
The statistic shows Minnesota Timberwolves players with the most points in franchise history. Kevin Garnett is the career points leader of the Minnesota Timberwolves with 2,01 points.

This statistic shows the value of Rakuten Ichiba's sales from the first quarter of 2013 to the second quarter of 2015. In the second quarter of 2015, Rakuten Ichiba's sales amounted to 37.97 billion yen.
This statistic shows the quantity of all cheese produced in the United States in February 2016, by type. In that month, the U.S. production of mozzarella amounted to 341 million pounds.
This statistic shows the approval rates of presidents in office in Chile from 2002 to 2018. In 2018, the approval rate of Chilean presidents was 45 percent.

This statistic presents the leading product categories bought online among internet users in the United States as of November 2017, sorted by gender. During the survey period, it was found that 49 percent of male internet users and 71 percent of female internet users bought clothing, accessories and health and beauty products online.

This statistic shows the number of monthly tests taken and passed for practical driving in the United Kingdom ( UK ) from January 2015 to March 2020. In March 2020, there were 38,375 practical driving tests taken and passed in the UK.
This statistic shows the number of employees of ABB Group from the fiscal year of 2010 to the fiscal year of 2019. In the fiscal year of 2019, ABB employed 144,400 people.

This statistic shows the share of mobile phone usage for connecting to a public WiFi internet outside of home or work in Finland in 2017, by age group. In 2017, 42 percent of the Finnish population aged 16 to 24 years used a mobile phone for connecting to a public WiFi internet outside of home or work.
This statistic depicts the global sales of small domestic appliances in 2013. In 2013, electric cooking pots generated 919.1 million U.S. dollars in global sales.

This statistic shows the frequency of baking at home using cake or bread mixes in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in 2014. During the survey, 12 percent of respondents stated they would bake at home once/few times a month.

This statistic presents the social media presence of small businesses in the United States as of March 2018. During the survey period, it was found that 86 percent of small businesses had a Facebook account.
This statistic shows Diamond Offshore Drilling's number of employees from 2010 to 2019. In 2019, Diamond Offshore Drilling employed approximately 2,500 people.
This statistic shows the average life expectancy in Africa for those born in 2020, by gender and region. In 2020, the average life expectancy for women in Western Africa was 59 years.

This statistic shows the median age of the population in North Macedonia from 1950 to 2020. The median age is the age that divides a population into two numerically equal groups ; that is, half the people are younger than this age and half are older. It is a single index that summarizes the age distribution of a population. In 2015, the median age of the North Macedonian population was 37.4 years.

At the end of fiscal year 2018, the installed power capacity across the Indian state of Himachal Pradesh was around 4,446 megawatts. The country's national electric grid had an installed capacity of over 1.2 gigawatts in the fiscal year of 2018.

This statistic shows the lumber and construction material sales of merchant wholesalers in the United States from 1992 to 2014. In 2014, the lumber and construction material sales of U.S. merchant wholesalers amounted to about 160.2 billion U.S. dollars.

Due to the outbreak of the coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) in Poland in 2020, the opinion of parents on online education was very good, with only eight percent of parents saying that they had a good online education. This statistic shows the estimated Netflix revenue in Canada from 2011 to 2015. In 2015, Netflix's revenue amounted to 447.1 million Canadian dollars.

This statistic shows the average inflation rate in selected global regions in 2019, compared to the previous year. In 2019, the average inflation rate in the European Union amounted to about 1.44 percent compared to the previous year.
The statistic shows the value of the National Hockey League franchise by team in 2019. The New York Rangers had a franchise value of 1.65 billion U.S. dollars in 2019.

This statistic shows the median age of the population in Vietnam from 1950 to 2050.The median age is the age that divides a population into two numerically equal groups ; that is, half the people are younger than this age and half are older. It is a single index that summarizes the age distribution of a population. In 2015, the median age of the Vietnamese population was 30.5 years.
This statistic shows the quarterly revenue of Nike worldwide from 2017 to 2020. In the fourth quarter of 2020, Nike's global revenue amounted to about 6.33 billion U.S. dollars.
This statistic shows the total population of Albania from 2015 to 2019, with projections up until 2025. In 2019, the total population of Albania amounted to approximately 2.87 million inhabitants.

In 2019/2020, the Philippines was the leading rice importing country worldwide, with an import volume of approximately 2.5 million metric tons. China ranked second, with rice imports amounting to around 2.3 million metric tons.
This statistic shows the sales growth of the leading sanitary napkin vendors in the United States in 2012. In that year, Procter and Gamble's sales growth amounted to 0.7 percent.

This statistic displays the rate of organ transplantation activity per million population in Croatia from 2017 to 2019, by organ type. In 2019, the rate of kidney transplantation activity per million population in Croatia was 39.3 per million population.

This statistic shows the tourism expenditure in the Netherlands from 2010 to 2018, by category. In 2018, the expenditure of domestic tourism in the Netherlands amounted to approximately 46.7 billion euros.

This statistic shows the total transfer expenditure of clubs of the Premier League in the United Kingdom ( UK ) from 2010/2011 to 2019/2020. In the 2019/20 season, the total transfer expenditure of the Premier League club amounted to approximately 1.56 billion British pounds.

This statistic presents the distribution of user engagement with brand posts on Facebook in the fourth quarter of 2012 and the fourth quarter of 2013, by type. In the fourth quarter of 2013, video content accounted for 2.9 percent of user engagement with brand posts.
This statistic shows the American customer satisfaction index scores of Taco Bell restaurants in the United States from 2000 to 2020. Taco Bell's ACSI score was 74 in 2020.

This statistic shows the median sales price of condominiums in Miami, Florida in the fourth quarter of 2019, by unit size. In that quarter, the median sales price for a two bedroom condominium in Miami, Florida amounted to 516.25 thousand U.S. dollars.

This statistic presents the fastest growing public online and tech companies as of March 2017, based on three-year average sales growth. During the measured period, GrubHub was the fastest growing public online and tech company with 52 percent growth.

This statistic shows the gross domestic product ( GDP ) at current prices in Norway from 2009 to 2019. In 2019, the gross domestic product ( GDP ) at current prices in Norway amounted to around 3.54 trillion Norwegian kroner.

This statistic shows Nike's revenue in Europe, the Middle East and Africa ( EMEA ) from 2016 to 2020, by segment. In 2020, Nike's footwear segment generated a revenue of approximately 5.89 billion U.S. dollars.

As of July 30, 2020, the number of coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) cases in England amounted to 7,758, while the number of female cases amounted to 11,788. The number of coronavirus cases in England was highest among men between the ages of 85 and 89 years, with 7,955 males and 10,450 females. For further information about the coronavirus ( COVID-19 ) pandemic, please visit our dedicated Facts and Figures page.

This statistic shows the distribution of children's and junior's apparel items and clothing accessories in Italy in 2019, by distribution channel. In 2019, 47.7 percent of children's and junior's apparel items and clothing accessories were sold through chain or franchising channels.
This statistic shows the age structure in Nicaragua from 2009 to 2019. In 2019, about 29.85 percent of Nicaragua's total population were aged 0 to 14 years.
This statistic shows the reasons for reading among adults in the United States as of April 2017. During the survey, 98 percent of respondents stated that they read for pleasure.

This statistic shows the number of retail chains by sector in Iceland in 2016. Food was the leading sector, with five chains, followed by footwear leather, and DIY gardening. There were two retail chains in Iceland in 2016.

This statistic presents the distribution of Reddit users in the United States as of February 2016, sorted by ethnicity. During the survey period, it was found that 70 percent of U.S. Reddit news users were of Hispanic ethnicity.
This statistic shows the market size of soft drinks in Indonesia from 2010 to 2014. In 2014, the market size of soft drinks in Indonesia amounted to approximately 70429 billion IDR.
This statistic shows the number of licensed plastic surgeons in Brazil between 2013 and 2018. In 2018, the number of licensed plastic surgeons in Brazil amounted to approximately 6.3 thousand.

This statistic shows the results of a survey among Americans on whether they think the U.S. is doing the right thing by fighting the war in Afghanistan now, or not. In September 2009, 47 percent of respondents stated that the U.S. is doing the right thing by fighting the war in Afghanistan.

This statistic shows the share of cars bought in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in 2013 and 2015, by gender and age. The survey revealed that eight percent of women and 18 percent of men bought a used car in the last two years.

This statistic shows the percentage of adults in the United States who believed select diseases were a severe threat to global public health as of 2019. According to the data, 39 percent of respondents believed Ebola was a severe threat to global public health.

This statistic shows the number of incidents in which police firearms were discharged in England and Wales between 2008/09 and 2018/19. In 2018/19 there were 13 incidents in which police firearms were discharged.
The timeline shows the value of remittances received in Vietnam from 2000 to 2019. In 2019, the value of remittances received in Vietnam amounted to 17.0 billion U.S. dollars.
This statistic shows the consumption volume of cement in France from 2011 to 2016. In 2016, approximately 17.4 million tons of cement were consumed in France.

This statistic presents Twitter's quarterly timeline views worldwide from the first quarter of 2012 to the fourth quarter of 2014. In the fourth quarter of 2014, Twitter's timeline views amounted to 181.95 billion.
This statistic shows the number of physical CD shipments in the United States from 1999 to 2019. In 2019, 46.5 million U.S. albums were shipped in the United States.

This statistic shows the results of a survey on the benefits of working remotely in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in 2014. During the survey, 22 percent of respondents stated that the biggest benefit to working remotely was the flexibility to work from any location.

This statistic shows the national debt of Madagascar from 2014 to 2018, with projections up until 2024. The figures refer to the whole country and include the debts of the state, the communities, the municipalities and the social insurances. In 2018, the national debt of Madagascar amounted to approximately 5.08 billion U.S. dollars.
This statistic shows the total population of Amsterdam from 2009 to 2019. In 2019, the total population of Amsterdam amounted to approximately 8.62 million inhabitants.

This statistic depicts the projected size of the global immunohistochemistry market from 2018 to 2027. In 2018, the global immunohistochemistry market was valued at approximately 1.78 billion U.S. dollars.

This statistic shows the number of VAT and/or PAYE based enterprises in the manufacture of games and toys in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in 2020, by turnover size band. In 2020, there were 230 enterprises with a turnover of between 50 and 50 million British pounds.

This statistic shows Spectrum Brands'net sales share of the global pet care ( GPC ) segment in 2019, by product category. In that year, aquatics accounted for 31 percent of Spectrum Brands'global pet care ( GPC ) segment.
This statistic shows the number of recent immigrants to Nova Scotia, Canada from 2001 to 2020. Between July 1, 2019 and June 30, 2020, there were 6,239 new immigrants to Nova Scotia.

This statistic shows the forecasted percentage change on a year earlier of real household disposable income in the United Kingdom from 2017 to 2023. In 2023, the real household disposable income in the United Kingdom is expected to decrease by 1.6 percent compared to the previous year.
This statistic shows the turnover of Gebr. Heinemann worldwide from 2013 to 2019. In 2019, Gebr. Heinemann's global turnover amounted to approximately 3.6 billion euros.

This statistic shows the growth rate of capital investment in the travel and tourism industry in the United Kingdom ( UK ) from 2012 to 2017, with projections up until 2028. In 2017, capital investment in the travel and tourism industry grew by 2.3 percent.

This statistic shows the average age at widow ( er ) hood in the Netherlands from 2008 to 2018, by gender. In 2018, the average age at widow ( er ) hood was 75.3 years for men and 73.6 years for women.

This statistic shows the federal government development expenditure as a proportion of GDP in Malaysia from 2012 to 2019, with a forecast for 2020, by type. In 2019, the federal government development expenditure as a proportion of GDP in Malaysia amounted to 1.9 percent.

This statistic shows the internet penetration in Argentina from 2015 to 2019, with projections up until 2025. In 2019, 70 percent of the population in Argentina accessed the internet. This share is projected to grow to 75 percent by 2025.
This statistic shows the availability of 4G in South Africa in 2020, by network operator. In 2020, MTN was the most available network operator in South Africa with a 4G availability of 89.5 percent.

This statistic shows the number of immigrants who arrived in the United States from 1820 to 1870, by nationality. The number of immigrants who arrived in the United States from 1820 to 1870 amounted to 270,0493.

This statistic shows the results of a survey among Americans on whether they consider Donald Trump to be a serious candidate for president, or not. 25 percent of respondents stated that they consider Donald Trump to be a serious candidate for president.

This statistic shows the national debt of Cyprus from 2014 to 2018, with projections up until 2024. The figures refer to the whole country and include the debts of the state, the communities, the municipalities and the social insurances. In 2018, the national debt of Cyprus amounted to approximately 23.39 billion U.S. dollars.

This statistic depicts the number of mobile cellular subscriptions per 100 inhabitants in Burkina Faso from 2000 to 2019. There were 100.21 mobile subscriptions registered for every 100 people in 2019.
The statistic depicts the least value of Major League Baseball franchises from 2002 to 2020. In 2020, the least value of Major League Baseball franchises was 980 million U.S. dollars.
This statistic shows the total assets of the Agricultural Bank of China from 2008 to 2019. In 2019, the total assets of the Agricultural Bank of China amounted to approximately 24.8 trillion yuan.

This statistic shows the best car manufacturers in Great Britain in 2014, based on seat comfort scores. In that year, Volvo was the best car manufacturer in Great Britain, with a seat comfort score of 94.76 percent.
This statistic shows the typical lifetime of coffee machines in the United States, by product type. The typical life expectancy of a fully automatic espresso coffee machine was 10 years.
This statistic shows the most important export partner countries for Albania in 2017. In 2017, the most important export partner of Albania was Italy with a share of 53.4 percent in exports.

This statistic shows the estimated number of fatalities due to influenza pandemics in the United States. The Spanish flu was estimated to have caused approximately 675,000 deaths in the United States between 1818 and 1919.

In 2020, the Epidemiological Surveillance Budget in Mexico amounted to 533 million Mexican pesos, up from 573 million pesos a year earlier. Epidemiological surveillance measures are designed to protect the health of individuals and their families.

This statistic shows the percentage of students in default on student loans after attending two-year and 4-year institutions in the United States in 2015, by institution type. In 2015, 16.7 percent of students in public 4-year institutions were in default on student loans.
This statistic shows the market share of no or low calorie soft drinks in Italy from 2010 to 2019. In 2019, the market share of no or low calorie soft drinks in Italy amounted to 11 percent.
This statistic shows the labor force in Curaçao from 2014 to 2018. In 2018, the labor force in Curaçao amounted to 70,153 people.

This statistic shows the share of travelers who take at least one mobile device on trips worldwide as of October 2014, by traveler type. During the survey period, 97 percent of business travelers stated that they took at least one mobile device on trips worldwide.
This statistic shows the market share of Audi cars in the United Kingdom ( UK ) from October 2016 to September 2020. In September 2020, Audi had a market share of 6.67 percent.

This statistic shows the results of a survey on asylum applications in Germany as of 2020. According to the data, 25.9 percent of asylum applications in Germany were rejected or completed by a formal decision.

This statistic presents the distribution of internet users in India as of October 2015, sorted by gender and urbanity. During the survey period, it was found that 38 percent of Indian internet users were female, 62 percent were male.

This statistic shows the number of casualties at the Battle of Chancellorsville in the American Civil War in 1863. The Battle of Chancellorsville was the largest battle between Union and Confederacy. The Battle of Chancellorsville was the first battle between Union and Confederacy.

This statistic presents the share of Apple Music users in the United States as of February 2018, sorted by age group. During the survey period, it was found that 23 percent of U.S. Apple Music users were aged between 35 and 44 years.
This statistic shows the global installed base of mobile PC from 2005 to 2015. In 2010, the installed base of mobile PCs amounted to approximately 5762 million units.
